segments.text: I heard you received a prize for you book .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yes , I did . I won a prize for best local history book at the annual book awards .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: congratulations ! You must be very proud of your achievement .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: actually , I was happy just to get the book published . Winning the prize was an added bonus .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I won $ 200 to spend on any books of my choice .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that ’ s a great prize for a person who writes books ! Have you ever won a prize before ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I shared a prize with some friends last week . We won a bottle of whisky at a pub quiz .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I won $ 10 in the lottery last month . Perhaps next time , I ’ ll be luckier and win the jackpot !
segments.speaker: S1
